description.zh-cn: 北宋第八位皇帝，艺术家，自创“瘦金书”字体。因靖康之变被俘，客死异乡。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, an artist known for creating the "Slender Gold" style of calligraphy. He was captured during the Jingkang incident and died in captivity.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第六位皇帝，宋徽宗之父。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, father of Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 宋神宗的妃嫔，宋徽宗的生母，被追尊为皇后。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Shenzong and the biological mother of Emperor Huizong, posthumously honored as an empress.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第七位皇帝，宋徽宗之兄。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, elder brother of Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 北宋末代皇帝，宋徽宗长子。与宋徽宗一同于靖康之变被俘。
description.en: The last emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, the eldest son of Emperor Huizong. Captured along with his father during the Jingkang Incident.

description.zh-cn: 宋神宗的皇后，在宋哲宗去世后，支持宋徽宗继位。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Shenzong who supported Emperor Huizong's succession after Emperor Zhezong's death.

description.zh-cn: 北宋宰相，曾反对宋徽宗继位。
description.en: A chancellor of the Northern Song dynasty who opposed Emperor Huizong's succession.

description.zh-cn: 北宋宰相，宋徽宗时期“六贼”之一，被认为是导致北宋灭亡的奸臣。
description.en: A chancellor of the Northern Song dynasty, one of the "Six Traitors" during Emperor Huizong's reign, considered a corrupt official who contributed to the fall of the dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋宦官、将领，宋徽宗时期“六贼”之一。
description.en: A eunuch and general of the Northern Song dynasty, one of the "Six Traitors" during Emperor Huizong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 金朝第二位皇帝，发动靖康之变，俘虏了宋徽宗和宋钦宗。
description.en: The second emperor of the Jin dynasty, who launched the Jingkang Incident and captured Emperor Huizong and Emperor Qinzong.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继五代十国之后的朝代，与南宋合称宋朝。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history following the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period. Together with the Southern Song, it forms the Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由女真族建立的统治中国北方和东北地区的封建王朝。
description.en: A feudal dynasty established by the Jurchen people that ruled northern and northeastern China.

description.zh-cn: 金朝攻破北宋首都东京，俘虏了宋徽宗、宋钦宗二帝，导致北宋灭亡的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event in which the Jin dynasty conquered the Northern Song capital, Tokyo, and captured Emperors Huizong and Qinzong, leading to the fall of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋末年宋江领导的农民起义。
description.en: A peasant rebellion led by Song Jiang at the end of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋末年方腊领导的农民起义。
description.en: A peasant rebellion led by Fang La at the end of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋与金朝为联合夹击辽朝而订立的盟约。
description.en: An alliance formed between the Northern Song and Jin dynasties to jointly attack the Liao dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由契丹族建立的统治中国北方的封建王朝。
description.en: A feudal dynasty established by the Khitan people that ruled northern China.

description.zh-cn: 北宋末年东京的著名艺伎，与宋徽宗有交往。
description.en: A famous courtesan in Tokyo during the late Northern Song dynasty, who had a relationship with Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 北宋著名词人，传说与宋徽宗为李师师争风吃醋。
description.en: A famous poet of the Northern Song dynasty, rumored to have been a rival of Emperor Huizong for the affection of Li Shishi.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗的原配皇后，宋钦宗的生母。
description.en: Emperor Huizong's first empress consort and the biological mother of Emperor Qinzong.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗的继室皇后，靖康之变被俘。
description.en: Emperor Huizong's second empress consort, captured during the Jingkang Incident.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗的妃嫔，宋高宗的生母。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Huizong and the biological mother of Emperor Gaozong.

description.zh-cn: 金朝第三位皇帝，为改善与南宋关系，追封宋徽宗为天水郡王。
description.en: The third emperor of the Jin dynasty who posthumously honored Emperor Huizong as Prince of Tianshui Commandery to improve relations with the Southern Song.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗为宋神宗第十一子。
description.en: Emperor Huizong was the eleventh son of Emperor Shenzong.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗是宋哲宗之弟，并继承其皇位。
description.en: Emperor Huizong was the younger brother of Emperor Zhezong and succeeded him to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 宋钦宗是宋徽宗长子。
description.en: Emperor Qinzong was the eldest son of Emperor Huizong.

description.zh-cn: 显恭皇后为宋徽宗元配皇后。
description.en: Empress Wang (Xiangong) was Emperor Huizong's first empress consort.

description.zh-cn: 显肃皇后为宋徽宗继室皇后。
description.en: Empress Zheng (Xiansu) was Emperor Huizong's second empress consort.

description.zh-cn: 在宋哲宗无子去世后，向太后支持当时为端王的赵佶继位。
description.en: After Emperor Zhezong died without an heir, Empress Dowager Xiang supported Zhao Ji, then Prince Duan, to succeed the throne.

description.zh-cn: 反对当时为端王的赵佶继位，称其“轻佻，不可以君天下”。
description.en: Opposed the succession of Zhao Ji, then Prince Duan, stating he was "frivolous and cannot rule the empire."

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗任用蔡京为相，导致政治腐败。
description.en: Emperor Huizong appointed Cai Jing as chancellor, leading to political corruption.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗任用宦官童贯为将军，引发严重问题。
description.en: Emperor Huizong's appointment of the eunuch Tong Guan as a general caused serious problems.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗时期的政治腐败和横征暴敛激起了宋江起义。
description.en: The political corruption and heavy taxation during Emperor Huizong's reign triggered the Song Jiang rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗时期的政治腐败和横征暴敛激起了方腊起义。
description.en: The political corruption and heavy taxation during Emperor Huizong's reign triggered the Fang La rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗与金国结成海上之盟以联合灭辽。
description.en: Emperor Huizong formed the Alliance on the Sea with the Jin dynasty to jointly destroy the Liao dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 海上之盟的建立导致了辽朝的灭亡。
description.en: The formation of the Alliance on the Sea led to the fall of the Liao dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 靖康之变导致北宋灭亡。
description.en: The Jingkang Incident led to the fall of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 金太宗下诏废黜宋徽宗，并将其俘虏北上。
description.en: Emperor Taizong of Jin issued an edict to depose Emperor Huizong and took him captive to the north.

description.zh-cn: 金太宗下诏废黜宋钦宗，并将其俘虏北上。
description.en: Emperor Taizong of Jin issued an edict to depose Emperor Qinzong and took him captive to the north.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗禅位后，被其子宋钦宗软禁于龙德宫。
description.en: After abdicating, Emperor Huizong was placed under house arrest in Longde Palace by his son, Emperor Qinzong.

description.zh-cn: 民间流传宋徽宗喜爱青楼女子李师师，并多次私下会面。
description.en: It is widely rumored that Emperor Huizong was fond of the courtesan Li Shishi and met with her privately on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 传说宋徽宗与词人周邦彦为李师师争风吃醋。
description.en: According to legend, Emperor Huizong and the poet Zhou Bangyan were rivals for the affection of Li Shishi.

description.zh-cn: 金熙宗为改善与南宋关系，追封已故的宋徽宗为“天水郡王”，去除了原封号“昏德公”的侮辱含义。
description.en: To improve relations with the Southern Song, Emperor Xizong of Jin posthumously honored the deceased Emperor Huizong as "Prince of Tianshui Commandery", removing the insulting meaning of his previous title, "Duke Hunde" (Dim-witted Duke).
